body:
Hello guys! My name is _MrGenius_ and i consider myself an experienced player. I am Spanish, from the Canary Islands, and im 16 years old. 
I discovered this server a long time ago, and i've never felt like playing... but the Overcast Network started to be boring to me, a lot of hackers, KD and objective farmers, and a bit of focusing out there.... so i am going to play here a lot more with you all ^^
I use to play a lot aswell in other pvp servers such as Kohi, BadLion, McKits... I've got a PvP oriented Youtube Channel, and want to record some videos here... 

I am also going to be active at forums, and try to help and improve the community if i can :) See ya!

title: Hi everyone :)

replies.body: Welcome to Avicus! Its the best server :)
